level.heading: Savings provisions.
level.text: No provision of this subchapter shall be construed:
As an express or implied endorsement or approval by the Congress of any such construction, development, or operation of National Children's Island;
Except as provided in ยง 10-1405, to exempt the recreational park and playground from the laws of the United States or the District, including laws relating to the environment, health, and safety; or
To prevent additional conditions on the National Children's Island development or operation to mitigate adverse impacts on adjacent residential neighborhoods and park lands and the Anacostia River.
